14dip300 qty 14 IC socket
Socket pin type selection is a hotly contested personal choice.
Gold plate is less mechanically durable than tin, more corrosion resistant than the IC pins, and more expensive
Machined pins grip the pins more tightly, which is either considered a blessing or a curse, and cost more than folded sockets
The board aesthetically looks better if you use identical type sockets on the board, unless you're intentionally trying to highlight an area of the board.
In theory, you could use orange plastic sockets for the ECB interface, blue sockets for the memory decode logic...

chapter.para: Notes regarding accessories. Some examples of accessories are homemade cables, floppy drives, chassis.

A serial cable. VLM bought a 3 foot 9pin serial cable from Jameco part number 189333 for $3.25 on 2013-01-16, chopped the end off to connect t o a PC. Also purchased a 5x2 female IDC connector from Jameco part number 742215 for $1.09 on 2013-01-27 to connect to the SBCv2. In between goes a length of 10 conductor ribbon cable, Jameco part number 639672 for $4.49 on 2013-01-27. I insulated the splices with a large amount of heat shrink tubing and some electrical tape.

A ZIF socket for the eprom can be mounted, but it will make the Mini68000 take up two backplane slots, which may or may not matter. The components required are a Jameco 104012 32 pin ZIF $9.95 as of 2013-02-17 and two machined 32 pin sockets used as spacers, Jameco 105381 $1.35 each as of 2013-02-17. Stick one machined pin socket onto the zif, then stack another machined pin socket on making a stack of 3 sockets, then stick the whole works into the board, hopefully the board was assembled with machined sockets so that the weight of the ZIF won't pull the stack out of the PCB soldered socket.
You'll need some 2-pin shorting plugs for configuration jumpers, at least 15 or so. Jameco 112432 $0.12 on 2013-01-27 per VLM.
The testing chapter attempts to fully exercise a (recently) completed board to prove operation of all components. Troubleshooting advice will be provided.
